name: DungeonLords
overview: DungeonLords was printed in ANALOG Magazine issue 67. The game involves you controlling a character in a randomly generated dungeon, with the objective of rescuing as many prisoners as possible. To do this you will have to find your way through the maze of a dungeon, picking up keys (you can only carry one at a time) to unlock doors, and avoiding or fighting the snakes, birds and demons. Monsters do not shoot and will enter the dungeon when a teleporter is glowing red. You get only 1 point for killing a monster, but 1000 for either finishing a level or rescuing a prisoner, plus 100 points for each treasure you collect.
